item.title: Black hole blast outshines 10 trillion Suns

item.title: CERN creates cosmic “fireballs” that could reveal the Universe’s hidden magnetism

item.title: Scientists find hidden brain damage from a common pesticide

item.title: After 250 years, an 18th-century mechanical volcano erupts to life

item.title: The hidden “Big Bang” that decides how bowel cancer grows
